article:
Do you live in  a big house? How many  _  does your house have?
I have a pen pal. His  _  is Liu Jun and he  comes  from Guangxi. His family live in a small house  _  only two rooms. He lives far from school, but he has to  _  to school every day because he has no bike. At home, he doesn't have his own  _  ---he and his brother and sister sleep in the  _  room. There is no study. Liu Jun has to do  _  homework on the bed. He wishes  to have a desk. His brother, a 15-year-old boy, wishes to have a basketball.  _  he likes playing basketball very much.
Liu Jun and his family need our  _ . It's always nice to help others, right?
